issue.title: [CF 417] Interrupt Combat Log Event Icon
issue.body:
it seems something regarding combat log events isn't working properly in the current build
the following worked in r39x and stopped doing so since r40x hit. even though it had a problem determining the right duration of the spell used (similar to the bug with animations carrying over into a meta icon), as it always showed the duration for the highest priority element (in this case counterspell) the icon fired correctly when my target was interrupted by anyone. right now is does nothing anymore and i can't figure how to fix it.

comments.body:
I'm really at a loss on how to handle this one. It broke because of an intentional change that I made so that spell interrupt icons could be filtered by the spell that was interrupted instead of the spell that caused the interrupt.

Both implementations have their usefulness, so I want to have both available, but I'm just not sure how to do it. Possibly a tail call that switches the args and creates a fake event.......


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Here is this icon in a single icon instead of a bunch plus a meta icon. Requires r407.

^1^T^SShowTimer^B ^SCLEUEvents^T ^SSPELL_INTERRUPT_SPELL^B ^t^SType^Scleu ^SName^SWind~`Shear:~`2;~` 80964:~`4;~` 80965:~`4;~` Rebuke:~`4;~` Mind~`Freeze:~`4;~` Pummel:~`4;~` Kick:~`5;~` Spell~`Lock:~`6;~` Counterspell:~`7 ^SDestUnit^Starget ^SEnabled^B ^SCLEUDur^N0 ^SShowTimerText^B ^t^N48024^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Uses a new event, "Interrupt - Interrupt Spell Used" that has the old functionality.
